roleset.name: move population

example.name: usually without source
example.text: When Anne Volokh and her family immigrated to the U.S. 14 years ago, they started life in Los Angeles with only $400.

example.name: with source
example.text: John's family immigrated from Lower Slobovia in 1914.

example.text: the immigration of thousands of them from lebanon to foreign countries
